name: Asterisks
description:
ASTERISKS

Yet Another Asteroids Clone

******************************

INSTRUCTIONS
1) Move to avoid asterisks;
2) Shoot asterisks for points;
3) Extra lives at 500, 2000,
5000, 10000 and 20000 points;
4) Try to set a highscore!

Made with Construct 3 ©Scirra
Inspired by Asteroids ©Atari, Inc.
